purpose: Cross-repository compliance checking and standardization framework
guidelines: This is the meta-repository for managing all my-* repositories
Compliance checks are modular - each check is a separate script
Use GITHUB_TOKEN for github-repo-standards operations, App token for cross-repo
Template file approach for issue bodies, not heredocs
Always check for existing open issues before creating new ones
github-repo-standards checks itself for compliance too

important_files.COMPLIANCE.md: Source of truth for compliance standards
